pros:
Great colleagues 
Good salary
Excellent facilities 
Free access to staff to Book of Kells exhibition
cons: None. There are strong academic expectations but this helped me develop as a tutor and researcher.

pros: It's really nice working there and makes me feel fulfilled. The staff are all friendly and the students aren't too difficult to deal with
cons: It's kind of boring and made me unfulfilled with the work. Maybe if more effort was made to make staff feel good about their work it would be better

pros:
energetic staff
highly creative, dynamic environment
cons: Unsociable hours can be an issue, but it comes with the industry
